content: Nothing in biology makes sense except in the light of evolution.
author: Theodosius Dobzhansky

content: The more we study, the more we discover how much we do not know.
author: Louis Pasteur

content: Biology is the most powerful technology ever created. DNA is software, protein is hardware, cells are factories.
author: Arvind Gupta

content: Research is what I'm doing when I don't know what I'm doing.
author: Wernher von Braun

content: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: The cell is the basic unit of life.
author: Robert Hooke

content: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
author: Charles Darwin

content: The art and science of asking questions is the source of all knowledge.
author: Thomas Berger

content: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
author: Immanuel Kant
